roleset.name: fill, filling/emptying with/of liquid
roleset.note: PUMP-V NOTES: Member of Vncls spray-9.7-1. Comparison with load. Checked by Julia, 10/2010. (from pump.01-v)
PUMPING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on pump.01. Corresponds to VNcls spray-9.7-1. (from pumping.01-n)

example.name: all args
example.text: Osamu Nagayama, deputy president of Chugai, which spends about 15% of its sales on research and development, was unable to pinpoint [how much money]-1 Chugai would pump *trace*-1 into Gen-Probe.

example.name: all args. Unfortunate by-product indeed.
example.text: He views the death of the inhabitants as an unfortunate by-product of his pumping water into the cistern.

example.name: with source, DIR
example.text: I do remember discussing it with him, and my water back-up coincided with his pumping water out of his pool.

roleset.name: move up and down
roleset.note: PUMP-V NOTES: No Vncls. Checked by Julia, 10/2010. (from pump.04-v)
PUMPING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, pump.04. No VNcls. (from pumping.04-n)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Styka sat beside him and pumped his hand excitedly .

example.name: Light Verb.
example.text: The semi-automatic that I have does the pumping for you .

example.name: Always wanted to try this.
example.text: He used a motorcar powered by his pumping the handle for most of his career.

roleset.name: inflate, pumping_up: inflating
roleset.note: PUMPING_UP-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on pump.02. No VNcls. (from pumping.02-n)

roles.note: Might take additional arguments (EXT, start point, end point), as per'increase', but we'll wait and see. (from pump.02-v)

example.name: Hans und Franz
example.text: The SEC has alleged that [Mr. Antar]-1 aimed *trace*-1 to pump up the company's stock price through false financial statements in order to sell his stake and reap huge profits.
example.arg: in order to sell his stake and reap huge profits

example.name: physical inflation
example.text: You can get them a bit cheaper if you-1 are willing *-1 to pump it up yourself .

example.name: metaphorical
example.text: His pumping up the crowd was when he would spaz out and do jumping jack motions.

example.name: poor John
example.text: John pumped out his basement apartment with a handpump.
